message: Implemented preference for read/write Modbus types in RealPLC, with safe fallbacks.

key_points: Cache now includes read_modbus_type and write_modbus_type from view
read_parameter prefers read_modbus_type: coil/discrete_input -> coils; holding/input -> holding
write_parameter prefers write_modbus_type: coil -> coil; holding -> registers
Fallback to data_type mapping remains for robustness
Added TODOs for communicator support of input registers and discrete inputs
Simulation clarified via comments: ignores Modbus type differences
